== Configure Google Calendar ==

=== How to configure a calendar to be the one nDoctor uses ===

||*/!\ Modification of the configuration file could be dangerous. /!\* ||

By default the calendar nDoctor uses is the default one. Here's how to change it:

 * Make a backup of your database and your configuration file
 * Open the configuration file "Probel.NDoctor.View.Core.exe.config"
 * Modify the key `DefaultCalendar` and replace the value with the url of the calendar you want to use.
 * [`Explanation on how to find the calendar url here`]
